content.prompt: Which of the following statements best describes the harmonic rhythm of sections 1 and 2 ?

choices.label: The harmonic rhythm of section 2 is slower than that of section 1.
The harmonic rhythm of section 2 is faster than that of section 1.
The harmonic rhythm of section 2 is the same as that of section 1.
The harmonic rhythm of section 1 accelerates, while that of section 2 slows down.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

topic.text: 4.3: Harmonic Progression, Functional Harmony, and Cadences

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Use symbols and terms to describe features of pitch in performed music, including pitch patterns and relationships, melodic features, chords, harmonic progressions, and cadences.
